records_skills_boss_skills_typhon_thorny.name: Ring of Flame
records_skills_boss_skills_typhon_thorny.description: Encircles you in a searing ring of flames burning all enemies that come within its radius.

records_skills_boss_skills_nehebkau_pois.name: Shrapnel
records_skills_boss_skills_nehebkau_pois.description: Packed with volatile liquid and metal scraps, the Poison Gas Bomb will explode violently on impact showering the area with deadly Shrapnel.  Each fragment of shrapnel inflicts piercing damage to the enemies it hits.

records_skills_shrines_shrine_typhon_fro.name: Frostbite Stone
records_skills_shrines_shrine_typhon_fro.description: The player's weapon is infused with the essence of frost, slowing enemies greatly and causing small amounts of damage.

records_skills_hunting_weaponskill_gouge.name: Gouge
records_skills_hunting_weaponskill_gouge.description: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to inflict deep wounds that will result in prolonged bleeding.

records_skills_boss_skills_manticore_poi.name: Lay Trap
records_skills_boss_skills_manticore_poi.description: Drops a mechanical bolt trap that will trip when enemies draw near and rapidly fire out deadly bolts.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_charon_p.name: Volcanic Orb
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_charon_p.description: Lobs a burning orb of fiery brimstone that explodes when it hits the ground inflicting fire and physical damage to enemies in a small radius.

records_skills_defensive_weaponpool_shie.name: Shield Smash
records_skills_defensive_weaponpool_shie.description: A shield fighting technique that inflicts damage with both the weapon and the shield.

records_skills_storm_freezingblast.dbr.name: Freezing Blast
records_skills_storm_freezingblast.dbr.description: Encases enemies in ice, immobilizing them but also making them more difficult to damage.

records_xpack_skills_quest_skills_xsq27_.name: Spectral Energy Nexus
records_xpack_skills_quest_skills_xsq27_.description: Causes the Liche King's Spectral Energy Bolt to chain and hit additional enemies, damaging each one it strikes.

records_skills_boss_skills_iceenchantmen.name: Envenom Weapon
records_skills_boss_skills_iceenchantmen.description: Coats your weapons with deadly poison while activated.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_cr.name: Song of the Carrot
records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_cr.description: Cries of impending doom possess enemies with terror

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_e.name: Greater Scroll of the Earthquake
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02x_e.description: Sends shockwaves of force through the surrounding ground, damaging and stunning any nearby enemies.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_li.name: Kwoll Blast
records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_li.description: A concentrated blast of poison that eradicates pesky enemies.

records_skills_medicine_medicinemastery_.description: Dispels Buffs

records_skills_monster_skills_diseasebuf.name: Plague
records_skills_monster_skills_diseasebuf.description: Plague afflicts nearby enemies with a debilitating ailment that reduces their health and quickly spreads to other nearby creatures.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.name: Metamorphosis
records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.description: Under tremendous heat and pressure, the composition of the Core Dweller hardens making it more resistant to damage.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.name: Divine Scroll of the Archmage's Fury
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_03x_a.description: Grants the caster improved control over their inner powers, allowing them to use their skills more quickly and more effectively.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_skeletal.name: Flame Surge
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_skeletal.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.

records_xpack_skills_shrine_skills_shrin.name: Stone of Thorns
records_xpack_skills_shrine_skills_shrin.description: Jagged thorns sprout from the player's body, damaging any enemies foolish enough to attack.

records_skills_warfare_battlerage_counte.name: Counter Attack
records_skills_warfare_battlerage_counte.description: Provides a chance to counter attack an enemy after being hit in Battle Rage.

records_skills_stealth_poisongasbomb.dbr.name: Poison Gas Bomb
records_skills_stealth_poisongasbomb.dbr.description: Lobs a bomb that will burst on impact releasing a cloud of toxic gas that damages enemies and impairs their attacks.

records_skills_nature_plague_susceptibil.name: Susceptibility
records_skills_nature_plague_susceptibil.description: Weakens the constitution of adjacent enemies making them more susceptible to physical and elemental damage.

records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_em.name: Emasculate
records_xpack_skills_equipment_skills_em.description: Temporarily drains an enemies strength and vigor

records_skills_warfare_battlestandard_pe.name: Triumph
records_skills_warfare_battlestandard_pe.description: Seeing the inevitability of your triumph, enemies lose hope and the strength of their attack diminishes.

records_skills_warfare_dualwieldtechniqu.name: Tumult
records_skills_warfare_dualwieldtechniqu.description: A Dual Wield technique that hits up to 3 adjacent enemies.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_hades3_e.name: Ice Shard
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_hades3_e.description: Projects a deadly shard of ice at the target inflicting cold damage and temporarily slowing them.

records_skills_hunting_weaponskill_volle.name: Volley
records_skills_hunting_weaponskill_volle.description: A combat technique that uses the spear or bow to rapidly strike three times in succession.

records_skills_boss_skills_dragonliche_f.name: Flame Surge
records_skills_boss_skills_dragonliche_f.description: Three jets of flame erupt from the caster's hands each inflicting incinerating fire damage to enemies.

records_skills_monster_skills_attack_ran.name: Volcanic Orb
records_skills_monster_skills_attack_ran.description: Lobs a burning orb of fiery brimstone that explodes when it hits the ground inflicting fire and physical damage to enemies in a small radius.

records_xpack_skills_shrine_skills_shrin.description: The player's weapon is infused with the essence of frost, slowing enemies greatly and causing small amounts of damage.

records_skills_nature_wolf_petmodifer_ma.name: Maul
records_skills_nature_wolf_petmodifer_ma.description: A gnawing attack that rends enemy flesh causing bleed damage for a short duration.

records_skills_storm_stormwisp_petskill_.name: Eye of the Storm
records_skills_storm_stormwisp_petskill_.description: A wisp ability that increases elemental damage of all nearby allies for a duration and provides protection from lightning and cold damage.

records_skills_earth_eruption.dbr.description: Volcanic fissures form in the ground, emitting deadly geysers of molten flame and fiery chunks of brimstone.  Each fragment inflicts physical and fire damage to the enemies it hits.

records_skills_defensive_adrenaline_resi.name: Resilience
records_skills_defensive_adrenaline_resi.description: Increases how often an Adrenaline rush can be triggered.

records_skills_earth_heatshield.dbr.name: Heat Shield
records_skills_earth_heatshield.dbr.description: Casts a protective heat shield on the target that absorbs damage caused by fire.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_hadesall.name: Storm Nimbus
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_hadesall.description: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.

records_xpack_skills_dream_phantomstrike.name: Dream Stealer
records_xpack_skills_dream_phantomstrike.description: Devastate your enemies and steal their power by ripping the very dreams from their minds.

records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_fr.name: Greater Scroll of Frenzy
records_xpack_skills_scroll_skills_02_fr.description: Fills the caster with incredible fury, increasing their speed and the damage of their attacks.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_graeae_t.name: Squall
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_graeae_t.description: Creates a wind storm in the target area that decreases the projectile attack accuracy of enemies caught within it.

records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.name: Inner Fire
records_skills_earth_coredweller_petmodi.description: Increases the Core Dweller's speed and adds fire damage to its attacks.

records_skills_defensive_shieldcharge_di.name: Disruption
records_skills_defensive_shieldcharge_di.description: Increases the shock effect of Shield Charge, startling adjacent enemies and disrupting skill use for a time.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_cerberus.name: Storm Nimbus
records_xpack_skills_bossskills_cerberus.description: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.

records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_ga.name: Mirror Wall
records_xpack_skills_artifactskills_l_ga.description: A protective barrier appears around the player, reflecting enemies' spells back at them for a duration.

records_skills_storm_iceshard_velocity.d.name: Velocity
records_skills_storm_iceshard_velocity.d.description: Increasing the speed and damage of Ice Shard. Gives each shard a chance to punch through its target and keep going.

records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petmodi.name: Wraith Shell
records_skills_spirit_wraithlord_petmodi.description: Allows the Liche King to diminish its corporeal presence making it less vulnerable to all types of damage.

records_skills_nature_briarward_petskill.name: Thorns
records_skills_nature_briarward_petskill.description: Causes thorns to sprout from your Briar Ward that will damage enemies that hit it.

records_skills_defensive_battleawareness.name: Battle Awareness
records_skills_defensive_battleawareness.description: Enter a state of heightened awareness that allows you and your nearby allies to perceive and respond to attacks more effectively.

records_xpack_skills_bossskills_charon_s.description: When active, the player is imbued with the power of the storm, causing their attacks to strike with cold and lightning damage.

records_skills_nature_regrowth.dbr.description: A wave of healing energy rapidly restores lost life to the target ally.

records_skills_shrines_shrine_typhonskil.description: Grants the player improved proficiency with all skills.
